methods.javadoc: Returns the single instance of the OldLanguageFactory.
methods.name: getOldLanguageFactory
methods.comment: Returns the single instance of the OldLanguageFactory.

methods.name: getOldLanguage
methods.comment: Return old language if an old language specification file exists for the specified language and version.

params.name: majorVersion
params.comment: language major version, or -1 for latest version

return.comment: old language or null if specification not found.

methods.name: getLatestOldLanguage
methods.comment: Return language description for the latest version of an old language

return.comment: old language description or null if specification not found.

methods.javadoc: Return the Language Descriptions for the latest version of all old languages.
methods.name: getLatestOldLanaguageDescriptions
methods.comment: Return the Language Descriptions for the latest version of all old languages.

methods.javadoc:
Returns number of files which failed to parse properly.
 This only reflects minimal parsing of old language files
 which will prevent them from being added to old language map.
 This is intended to be used by a unit test.
methods.name: badFileCount
methods.comment:
Returns number of files which failed to parse properly.
 This only reflects minimal parsing of old language files
 which will prevent them from being added to old language map.
 This is intended to be used by a unit test.

methods.name: validateAllOldLanguages
methods.comment:
Validate all old language definitions contained within the old language map.  
 This is intended to be used by a unit test.

methods.name: createOldLanguageFile
methods.comment: Create old-language file for the specified language.

throws.comment: if lang is unknown to DefaultLanguageService
